replies.author: 二白丶
replies.txt_content:
合理使用effect的前后偏移和左右偏移,

爆炸环绕:
  Skills:
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;forwardOffset=2} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;forwardOffset=-2} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;forwardOffset=1;sideOffset=1} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;forwardOffset=1;sideOffset=-1} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;forwardOffset=-1;sideOffset=1} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;forwardOffset=-1;sideOffset=-1} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;sideOffset=2} @Self
  - effect:particles{type=explode;a=1;sideOffset=-2} @Self

直接打出来的，没测试。应该没问题
